articles.author: Colin Millar
articles.title: Erik ten Hag explained why Man Utd turned down Antonio Conte before Tottenham sacking - The Mirror
articles.description: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag has explained his football philosophy and ideals which stand in contrast to Antonio Conte - who the club overlooked last season
articles.content:
Erik ten Hag has previously outlined how his vision of football is perfectly suited to Manchester United as his success has proven how the club were right to overlook Antonio Conte last season.
